title: Nan Melville, 72, Whose Photography Captured Dance in Many Forms, Dies
description: Over a long career, her pictures, whether of famed dance troupes or experimental works, reflected what one admirer called “her love affair with dance.”
dc:creator: Neil Genzlinger
media:credit: Nan Melville for The New York Times
media:description: The Georgian ballerina Nina Ananiashvili as the Snow Maiden in the American Ballet Theater production of “The Snow Maiden” at the Metropolitan Opera House in 1998, as captured by Nan Melville.
